As an AI language model, I do not have access to Milner's decision-making process. However, Milner has been known to support a variety of social and political causes throughout his career, including education, science, and environmental initiatives.

In deciding which social causes to advocate for, Milner may consider his personal values and beliefs, as well as the potential impact of the cause on society as a whole. He may also assess the level of urgency or importance of the cause and whether he believes his participation or support can make a tangible difference.

In addition, Milner may work with organizations or experts in the field to gain a deeper understanding of the issues and identify the most effective ways to address them. Overall, Milner's approach to advocating for social causes may be informed by various factors, including his personal values, the potential impact of the cause, and advice from those with expertise in the field.
